details: I graduated from the University of South Florida in December 2017 with a B.S. in Computer Engineering. In college, I spent alot of my free time programming small robotics and microcontrollers.
I started my professional career at CAE USA Tampa as an Integration Engineer, moved to Avionics systems, before eventually settling as a frontend engineer.
During the Covid lockdown of 2020, I spent many nights and weekends diving into new technologies and solidifying my technical skills as a developer.
In my free time, I love to travel, work on my photography and videography, fly my drone, and just relax with my girlfriend, dog, and two rabbits.
